name: Bravely Second: End Layer - Deluxe Collector's Edition
summary:
As part of a Deluxe Collector’s Edition includes the game, an Original Soundtrack CD, Angés Mini Figurine* and a Deluxe Artbook of around 250 pages. 
 
Bravely Second on Nintendo 3DS is the sequel to 2013's Bravely Default and follows Yew Geneolgia along with companions Magnolia Arch, Tiz Arrior and Edea Lee as they Search for Agnès Oblige who has been kidnapped by the mysterious Emperor Oblivion and his cryst-fairy, Anne. 
The game promises to explore more of the land of Luxendarc and features the same stylish art as its predecessor, courtesy of lead artist and character designer Akihiko Yoshida.
